MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML4 postcode area of Bellshill. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:00pm to safely complete repair works on our underground cable network outside number 47 Clydesdale Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:34pm on Wednesday, 20 January 2021
